title: Coldwell Banker Jacksonville Agents Scraper (Optimized v2)

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Agent city pages or office pages to start from.

maxPages.title: Max list pages to crawl
maxPages.description: Upper limit for paginated list pages to enqueue.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: How many pages to crawl in parallel. Keep modest on small containers.

maxAgents.title: Stop after N agents
maxAgents.description: Soft cap to avoid run timeouts. Increase if you raise the run timeout.

blockResources.title: Block heavy resources
blockResources.description: Block images, fonts, media, stylesheets and common analytics domains to speed up crawling.

followContact.title: Follow Contact page if email missing
followContact.description: If true, enqueue the agent's Contact page when email is not found on profile.

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Use Apify Proxy or your own proxy.
